channel.title: How can I add defence requirements on my Torso, Claws, and Berserker?
channel.description: Please, give me some advice on how to change / add level requirements on these items. It will perfect my server. Then I can port-forward, and everony can play! :D

item.title: How can I add defence requirements on my Torso, Claws, and Berserker?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_u1 i_own__u
item.description:
@i_own_u1 wrote:

find public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {
scroll a little down untill you see like

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1;

then under return add

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("YOURITEMNAME")) { return YOURDEFLVLREQ; }

By youritemname add example: Desert
but if you use Torso he dont use
because your Torso name must be Torso

Read full topic
item.source: How can I add defence requirements on my Torso, Claws, and Berserker?
